name: Pearl Izumi Cyclone Gel Gloves - Men's
description: Keep your fingers nimble and your shifting smooth during wet or windy rides.Soft shell fabric provides wind and water protection. Synthetic leather palm is soft and durable.Gel padding bridges ulnar and median nerves for comfort.Conducive synthetic leather on index finger and thumb works with touchscreens.Soft, windproof fleece sniffle surface on thumb.Gauntlet design keeps wrists warm.Hook-and-loop closure.Reflective elements for visibility in low light.
